thread.section_title: New product topics in Answer HQ
thread.title: Unable to reach technical support, especially the TOS team - Answer HQ
thread.title_full: Unable to reach technical support, especially the TOS team - Answer HQ

author: K9X_Anas
title: Unable to reach technical support, especially the TOS team - Answer HQ
text:
Product : Origin
Platform : Mac
What game do you want to talk about? Apex legends
How accessible is the current experience? It's useless to me
Summarize what in the product is difficult to use. The model used to contact support, especially the TOS team, to request the removal or reduction of the ban
How is this making it more difficult? The automatic reply used by the TOS team makes it annoying, and it goes as follows: 'Please do not expect further responses on this matter
How can we reproduce this experience? I am reaching out to inform you that TOS team is using an automated response. You can verify this by reviewing the cases listed below: case 199846942 case 199701788 case 199055453 case 199052290 case 199045709
‌
